ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:51:16 [Issue ID 4000-676505] urn:comicvine:4000-676505 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/676505 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 15:10:03. [Issue ID 676505]
ComicInfo.Summary: War of the Witchblades Part 6: Sara has fatally stabbed Danielle and taken all of the Witchblade back. Tau'ma commands her to finish Dani off but the Angelus (who possessed Dani's friend, Finch, last issue) arrives to stop her. The Angelus leaves Finch and enters Danielle. The Angelus and the Witchblade battle but the light overcomes the darkness and Dani is able to use her powers to restore Sara to her former self. Furious at Tau'ma for manipulating her, Sara uses the Witchblade to drive him off. Danielle flies off to start her new life and Sara reunites with Patrick and Julie to continue her old one.
ComicInfo.Tags: Finch,Tau'ma,GUESTS: Patrick Gleason,Witchblade [Sara Pezzini],The Curator,Angelus [Danielle Baptiste],Angelus Warriors,VILLAINS: Sabine,Julie Pezzini
ComicInfo.Title: War of the Witchblades Part 6
